title: JAAL 1.1 key-value pair
description: A key which points to a value.

id.description: A unique identifier for the node among all data structures.

key.description: Key part of the key-value pair. If the type is string, it may also be an identifier of a graph, matrix, or node defined elsewhere.

value.description: Value part of the key-value pair. If the type is string, it may also be an identifier of a graph, matrix, or node defined elsewhere.
